title: Goicoechea 3D Crio Gel: Triple Action Cryoactive, Cooling Tech for Cellulite & Orange Peel Skin, 6.76 fl oz
features: ADVANCED FORMULA: Cryo Gel 3D with cryolipolisis technology is an effective treatment that acts directly con located fat through the cold, improving skin texture.
TRIPLE BENEFIT FOR FIRMER SKIN: Goicochea Cryo Gel 3D formula shapes the body, fights cellulite, eliminates orange peel skin and helps redefine body contour.

COOLING EFFECT: The cryogenic gel is a technology that has a cooling action, which acts by producing a sensation of cold. This triggers a positive stimulus on the lymphatic system, helping it to eliminate toxins and burn excess fatty acids in our body. It can be applied in any area affected by cellulite, mainly in the lower limbs.
FAST-ABSORBING GEL CREAM: It doesn't feel greasy, and doesn't make your skin feel sticky. Apply on thighs, gluts, hips and belly with circular massges until completly absorbed. Repeat twice a day.
GOICOECHEA SKIN CARE: Try our full line of skin care products including moisturizers, creams, and lotions for legs, feet, and hands, featuring natural ingredients for calming, firming and hydrating.

Ingredients: Ingredients: Aqua, Alcohol, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, Caffeine, Phenoxyethanol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Menthol°, Parfum, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Disodium Edta, Mentha Arvensis Leaf Oil°, Sodium Hydroxide, Trimethylcyclohexyl Butylcarbamate, Carnitine, Spirulina Platensis Extract, Soy Isoflavones, Ci 42090, Ci 19140, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citral, Limonene, Linalool
description: Goicochea Cryo Gel 3D is an innovative cooling technology that provides and instantly refreshing sensation and increases the firminess of the skin. The cryogenic works immediately to improve the appearance and elasticity of orange peel skin. The results? A smoother, firmer and soft skin.
